metadata.title: CVE-2021-47207 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:ALSA: gus: fix null pointer dereference on pointer blockThe pointer block return from snd_gf1_dma_next_block could benull, so there is a potential null pointer dereference issue.Fix this by adding a null check before dereference.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
